Theory: BTC tx fee = price of tx security / timeframe. (e.g. market says that Bitcoin provides $3 of security value for transactions confirmed within 2 hours. https://estimatefee.com  )pic.twitter.com/qVg0zs8GKi

Imo transaction fees, ideally, are the market's valuation of the security + speed of each tx. So currently, the market says that Bitcoin provides about $2-4 of security value for transactions confirmed within 24 hours.
